accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Use microfilm copies, Orange County, Reels 518-522 and 524.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Orange County Will Books, 1733-1801. Orange County Reels 518-522 and 524, Local Government Records Collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in a transfer of court papers from Orange County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Orange County was formed in 1734 from Spotsylvania County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Will Books, 1733-1801, of Orange County Court. The will books record the name of the person writing the will, the name of individuals listed in the will and an inventory and appraisment list. Both volumes contains indexes which contains the first and last names of both parties. It is arranged alphabetically from A-Z.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Orange County Will Books can be found on microfilm at The Library of Virginia. See A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm
